document_data.mainbody:
Valero Brokengulf was a member of House Brokengulf in 1489 DR.
Valero had a deeply hatred of Claugiyliamatar.
Valero always wanted to destroy his old familys enemy, Claugiyliamatar. In 1489 DR, rumors arose that the Cult of the Dragon wanted to transform her into a dracolich at last. With the support of House Silmerhelve, Valero hired an adventuring party to defeat the great dragon.
